name: Warp The Fight
description:
Warp The Fight is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter, where each arena has a physically impossible layout. 

Hexagons with six right angles, multiple halls occupying the same space or stairs going down leading you to the area above. 

Fight your friends in a chaotic, mind-bending battle.

Use the warped environment to your advantage.

Features: 
  • Up to 4 players in a match
  • 5 unique weapons each with a secondary firing mode
  • 7 different arenas with spatially impossible layouts
  • 3 types of power-ups
  • An offline practice mode with bots
  • An interactive tutorial
Multiplayer instructions:

There are a few ways to play this game with your friends:

  • LAN - if your computers are in the same LAN, have one of the players host a game. Then the rest of the players can join using the host's local IP address.
  • Port forwarding - this is a bit more advanced, but lets you play with people outside of your local network.
    The host needs to open a port in their router's settings. Although the exact procedure may vary between router models, these steps should be the same for most of them:
    • Open your router's settings by inserting its IP address into the address bar in your browser.
    • Log in to access the configuration panel.
    • Find the port forwarding settings (sometimes called the virtual server).
    • Open the port 2137 using the UDP protocol.
  • After the port has been opened, the rest of the players can join using the host's public IP address.

  (NOTE: never give your IP address to somebody you don't know)
